events.message: I received my order yesterday but the item is not what I expected. I want to request a refund because it does not match the product description.
The issue has been categorised as a refund-related case based on the customer's request mentioning refund and return.
A customer support agent has been assigned to handle the refund request for this order.
Hello! Iâ€™m sorry to hear the item did not meet your expectations. I am here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide the order number and a photo of the item you received to process the refund as quickly as possible?
Sure, my order number is 123456789 and I have attached a photo showing the item that does not match the description.
Thank you for the information. We have initiated your refund and you should see the amount credited to your original payment method within 5-7 business days.
Thank you for your quick response and help with the refund. I appreciate the easy process.
The refund case has been marked as resolved after confirming the refund initiation and customer satisfaction.
Just following up to ensure you received the refund and everything is settled on your end. Please let us know if you need further assistance.
We are closing this refund case now as all issues have been resolved and the customer confirmed satisfaction.
